greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Diagonal sums of number triangle A109956.
formula: G.f. : g/(1-f) where f/(1-f)^3=x and g=1-f; a(n)=(-1)^n*sum{k=0..floor(n/2), ((3k+1)/(2n-k+1))*binomial(3n-3k, n-2k)}.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 06 2005
